text:
UK based sales representation company JG collection welcomes two new professionals to the team
UK based sales representation company JG collection welcomes two new professionals to the team.
With its office situated in London and representing hotels in New York, London, Paris, Miami, Las Vegas, Scotland, Thailand & Italy; JG collection expands its network with two new additions to the team.
Simon Tetley for the MICE market and Rupert Tan for the Scottish and Northern Market, both gentlemen bring with them different but essential skill sets.
Simon Tetley
Simon joins JGC having spent 15 months as Luxury Sales Executive in the London Marriott Sales Office leading reactive sales for 22 Marriott hotels in the London cluster. During this time he produced results beyond his set targets and has built extremely firm relationships with a large number of UK Agencies, Previous to this Simon was Front Desk Supervisor at St Pancras Renaissance Hotel responsible for overseeing the front desk of a 5 star “luxury lifestyle” hotel. Simon graduated in 2011 with a degree in International Business Hospitality Management from Sheffield Hallam University. Simon covers territory divided between Jo and Joanne which ensures maximum coverage within the UK MICE market.
Rupert Tan (Sales Manager)
Rupert joins the JGC team to additionally cover the Scottish and Northern markets alongside Joanne Mannis. Rupert has a Bachelor of Science International Hotel Administration from Endicott College, Massachusetts. Rupert’s main experience has been in the Asian markets working in both Catering and Sales for JW Marriott and Ritz-Carlton Kuala Lumpur.
John Green, MD at JG Collection says:
‘We are delighted to welcome Simon and Rupert to the team and I feel their combined enthusiasm and commitment will be a great asset.”
The JG Collection team is now eight strong promoting exceptional luxury hotels in eight destinations of the world.
